sentences.sContent: Flynn was still handsome, though dissipated.
sentences.sCn: 弗林长相英俊，但沉迷酒色。

synos.tran: 消散的；沉迷于酒色的；闲游浪荡的；放荡的

remMethod.val: dis(表加强) + sip(喝， 饮) + ate → 到处吃喝 → 浪费； sip本身是一个常考单词

trans.tranCn: 沉迷于酒色的, 消散的, 闲游浪荡的
trans.tranOther: If you describe someone as dissipated, you disapprove of them because they spend a lot of time drinking alcohol and enjoying other physical pleasures, and are probably unhealthy because of this
